author: bencomic

right.text: And i can't even spell it.

left.text: Nope, i'm not a retard. I do however suffer Obsessive-compulsive disorder.

right.text: That's uncalled for. It's not funny.
If you find it hilarious, why not become a stand up comedian? Make fun of some people with problems, and i'll be there, laughing as they lynch you.

left.text: It's fucking my attempts at finding employment. I'm a good worker, but due to my *problem*, i fail many interviews.

title: ape shall never slap ape, part 2
